name: Short Dress
description: Short dress in woven fabric. Round neckline and opening at back of neck with a button. Yoke at back with concealed pleats, long sleeves, and narrow cuffs with ties. Side pockets. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Patterned Slacks
description: Ankle-length slacks in patterned stretch cotton satin. Regular waist with concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with slits at hems. 61% cotton, 36% polyester, 3% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Short Chiffon Dress
description: Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon. Gathers and small ruffle at shoulders, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Narrow, elasticized seam at waist and circle skirt with ruffled tiers. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: Off-the-shoulder Dress
description: Short, fitted off-the-shoulder dress in stretch ribbed fabric. Short raglan sleeves, seam at waist with gently flared skirt. Unlined. 54% rayon, 44% nylon, 2% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: V-neck Top
description: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Short Chiffon Dress
description: Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon. Gathers and small ruffle at shoulders, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Narrow, elasticized seam at waist and circle skirt with ruffled tiers. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: V-neck Top
description: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: V-neck Top
description: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Short Lace Dress
description: Short, straight-cut dress in lace. Opening at back with concealed button at back of neck. Round neck, padded shoulders, and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined. 51% cotton, 25% nylon, 24% rayon. Machine wash cold.

name: Fitted Dress
description: Fitted dress in thick jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves, and cut-out section at back with button at back of neck. Lined at top. 60% rayon, 35% nylon, 5% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: V-neck Jumpsuit
description: Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck and short butterfly sleeves. Concealed zip at back, seam at waist, and slightly slimmer, gently flared legs with creases. 92% polyester, 8% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: Chiffon Dress
description: Short dress in crinkled chiffon with a V-neck front and back. Horizontal ties at back of neck, pleats at top, and concealed side zip. Long, semi-sheer sleeves, gathered seam at waist, and flared skirt. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Skinny High Waist Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with distressed details. High waist, zip fly with button, and skinny legs. 99% cotton, 1% spandex.

name: Super Skinny High Jeans
description: Jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button. Mock pockets at front, regular pockets at back, and super-skinny legs. High waist. 78% cotton, 20% polyester, 2% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Oversized Denim Jacket
description: Oversized denim jacket with smooth metal buttons at front and at cuffs. Collar, chest pockets with flap and button, and side-seam pockets. Adjustable tab at back with buttons. 100% cotton. Machine wash cold.

name: Short Sweatshirt
description: Short sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbing at neckline, cuffs, and hem. 57% cotton, 43% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Long-sleeved Jersey Top
description: CONSCIOUS. Fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a round neckline. 92% cotton, 3% spandex, 3% rayon, 2% polyester.

description: 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with distressed details. High waist, zip fly with button, and skinny legs. 70% cotton, 28% polyester, 2% spandex. Machine wash...

description: CONSCIOUS. Fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a round neckline. 92% cotton, 3% spandex, 3% rayon, 2% polyester.

description: CONSCIOUS. Fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a round neckline. 92% cotton, 3% spandex, 3% rayon, 2% polyester.

description: Short sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbing at neckline, cuffs, and hem. 57% cotton, 43% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Crinkled Flounced Blouse
description: Blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with a printed pattern. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at front, and flounces at front. Long sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Rounded hem. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Bib Overall Dress
description: Short bib overall dress in twill. Shoulder straps tied together with metal eyelets at top. Chest pocket, front pockets, and back pockets. Unlined. 58% cotton, 42% lyocell. Machine wash cold.

name: Loose-knit Sweater
description: Soft, loose-knit sweater with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves, and roll edges at cuffs and hem. Longer at back. 100% acrylic. Machine wash warm.

name: Skinny Regular Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with heavily distressed details. Regular waist, zip fly, and slim legs. 82% cotton, 17% polyester, 1% spandex.

name: Henley-style Top
description: Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a scoop neckline, buttons at front, and long sleeves. 68% cotton, 27% polyester, 5% spandex.

name: Joggers
description: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticized drawstring waistband, side pockets, and elasticized hems. Soft, brushed inside. 70% cotton, 30% polyester.

name: Skirt with Lacing
description: Short skirt in soft twill with eyelets and lacing at front. Concealed zip at back with button. Unlined. 56% cotton, 44% lyocell. Machine wash cold.

name: Top with Tie
description: Short-sleeved top in soft jersey. Metal eyelets at front, contrasting tie, and contrasting ribbing at neck and cuffs. 100% cotton. Machine wash cold.

name: Joggers
description: Joggers in woven fabric with a slight rustle. Wide, elasticized drawstring waistband, side pockets, and a back pocket with zip. Wide jersey ribbing at hems. 54% polyester, 43% cotton, 3% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Chiffon Dress with Flounce
description: Calf-length dress in crinkled chiffon with a printed pattern. V-neck, sewn wrapover at front, and short sleeves. Flounced seam at waist, concealed zip at one side, and asymmetrical hem. Half lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Skirt with Lacing
description: Short skirt in soft twill with eyelets and lacing at front. Concealed zip at back with button. Unlined. 56% cotton, 44% lyocell. Machine wash cold.

name: V-neck Top
description: V-neck top in airy jersey with buttons at top and 3/4-length sleeves. Rounded hem with slits at sides. Slightly longer at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Hooded Jacket
description: Sweatshirt jacket with a lined drawstring hood. Zip at front, side pockets, and ribbing at cuffs and hem. 58% cotton, 42% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: Hooded Top
description: Wide-cut sweatshirt with a jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at cuffs and hem. 70% cotton, 25% polyester, 5% rayon. Machine wash warm.

name: Lyocell-blend Blouse
description: Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with Crenelate lyocell content. Opening at back of neck with button and wide sleeves with drawstring. 66% rayon, 19% polyester, 15% lyocell. Machine wash...

name: Bib Overall Dress
description: Short bib overall dress in twill. Shoulder straps tied together with metal eyelets at top. Chest pocket, front pockets, and back pockets. Unlined. 58% cotton, 42% lyocell. Machine wash cold.

name: Wide-leg Pants
description: Pants in carped, woven fabric with contrasting side stripes. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets, and straight legs with sewn cuffs. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: Ankle-length Slim-fit Pants
description: 5-pocket, ankle-length pants in stretch twill. Regular waist, zip fly with button, and slim, straight legs. 74% cotton, 25% polyester, 1% spandex. Machine wash...

description: Short sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbing at neckline, cuffs, and hem. 83% cotton, 15% polyester, 2% rayon.

name: V-neck Blouse
description: V-neck blouse in woven viscose fabric with buttons at top and 3/4-length sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits at sides. Slightly longer at back. 100% rayon. Machine wash cold.

name: Short Skirt
description: Short skirt in a woven modal blend with contrasting grosgrain trim. Concealed side zip and an attached belt at front with D-rings. Unlined. 72% modal, 28% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Mesh T-shirt
description: Long T-shirt in mesh with a V-neck. Yoke, dropped shoulders, and sleeves with contrasting grosgrain trim. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: Blouse with Embroidery
description: Wide-cut blouse in woven cotton fabric with embroidery. Rounded neckline, partially concealed buttons at front, and long, wide balloon sleeves with embroidery and cuffs. 100% cotton. Machine wash cold.

name: Wide-cut Cotton Top
description: Straight-cut top in thicker cotton jersey with decorative seams and stitching. Rounded shoulders and short sleeves. 96% cotton, 4% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: Pleated Skirt
description: Calf-length skirt in pleated, crped fabric with an elasticized waistband. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Coat
description: Long coat in woven fabric with viscose content. Collar, concealed buttons at front, and tie belt at waist. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves, and wide cuffs with buttons. Open chest pockets, side-seam pockets, and high slits at sides. Unlined. 66% polyester, 32% rayon, 2% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Wide-leg Pants
description: Wide-cut pants in soft, washed denim with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and zip fly. Pleats at top, side pockets, welt back pockets, and wide, straight-cut legs with creases at front and sewn cuffs at hems. 100% cotton. Machine wash cold.

name: Top
description: Top in soft, stretch viscose jersey. Wide neckline, long dolman sleeves, and visible seam front and back. 94% rayon, 6% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: Knit Mohair-blend Sweater
description: PREMIUM QUALITY. Wide-fitting knit sweater in a mohair blend. Small, ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. 32% nylon, 32% wool, 32% mohair, 4% spandex. Hand wash...

name: Dress
description: Calf-length dress in thick woven fabric with a collar. Button placket, flap chest pockets, and heavily dropped shoulders. Wide, tapered sleeves with buttons at cuffs, removable tie belt, and slits at sides. 63% polyester, 32% rayon, 5% spandex. Machine wash...

name: T-shirt with Embroidery
description: T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text. 100% cotton.
